duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist patients in clarifying their course of treatment and provide a safe environment.
Observe patients for changes in mental status and safety, and participate in de-escalation and restraint if needed.
Participate in admissions, discharge, orientation, and transfer of patients.
Take and record patients' vital signs, as directed.
Assist with or facilitate patients' self-management of Activities of Daily Living.
Coordinate activities of assigned patients and contribute to understanding/interventions for effective outcomes.
Implement Treatment Plan through carrying out counselor activities and documenting patients' participation in treatment and response to interventions.
Adhere to policies surrounding boundaries, patient confidentiality, and stay up to date on required trainings.
